explanation: [0-0] A young woman, wearing a gray top and a pink apron, sits in front of a large round griddle in a room. She wears a white glove on her left hand and holds a bamboo spatula. In her right hand, she holds a ladle filled with batter, and beneath it is a large stainless steel basin. Behind her, near the wall, are stacks of flour bags, and in the corner, a white iron shelf holds various items.
[0-4] Next, she shakes the batter in the ladle a few times with her right hand and then pours it onto the round griddle.

[24-32] Then, white steam starts to rise from the surface of the batter, indicating that it is about to be cooked. She then puts down the bamboo spatula, picks up a scraper with her left hand, scrapes the edge of the pancake, rotates the griddle with her right hand, slowly separates the entire pancake from the griddle, and then places the finished pancake on the right side with both hands.
